scenes.description: FLOW GLOW members finishing their performance and speaking to the audience.
Stage transition with countdown graphics and Hololive Countdown Live 2025-2026 logo.
Stage transition and introduction for the next song.
FLOW GLOW performing the song 'OUR TIME YELLOW'.

subtitles.original: 以上、私たちFLOW GLOWでしたー！
subtitles.english: That's all from us, FLOW GLOW!

subtitles.original: こっから先も楽しんでいこう！
subtitles.english: Let's keep enjoying the rest of the show!

subtitles.original: Tame the fire and bow before my justice
subtitles.english: Tame the fire and bow before my justice

subtitles.original: Final warning, you know my rage is limitless
subtitles.english: Final warning, you know my rage is limitless

subtitles.original: On the advent of a new Genesis
subtitles.english: On the advent of a new Genesis

subtitles.original: I'm infamous, yeah, I get a little villainous
subtitles.english: I'm infamous, yeah, I get a little villainous

subtitles.original: Look into my eyes, I'll take you up a level
subtitles.english: Look into my eyes, I'll take you up a level

subtitles.original: The true face that you just can't hide
subtitles.english: The true face that you just can't hide

subtitles.original: Clawing at the walls, I feel these sick temptations
subtitles.english: Clawing at the walls, I feel these sick temptations

subtitles.original: What do I have to sacrifice?
subtitles.english: What do I have to sacrifice?

subtitles.original: Bound by chains, desiring to do it my way
subtitles.english: Bound by chains, desiring to do it my way

subtitles.original: This hurricane of a devastating force is coming
subtitles.english: This hurricane of a devastating force is coming

subtitles.original: Out of the maze, feel my pulse is rising
subtitles.english: Out of the maze, feel my pulse is rising

subtitles.original: And igniting fire, snap it out!
subtitles.english: And igniting fire, snap it out!

subtitles.original: Walking the line on the edge of

subtitles.original: Becoming what I never thought I'd be better

subtitles.original: This state of gonna take them all out, RENEGADE!
subtitles.english: This state of gonna take them all out, RENEGADE!

subtitles.english: Walking the line, fell so far

subtitles.original: Into poison and seeing a new gotcha

subtitles.english: Locked and I'm loaded, take them all out

subtitles.original: RENEGADE, justice is just like that!
subtitles.english: RENEGADE, justice is just like that!

subtitles.original: Don't care at all, I'll go deeper
subtitles.english: Don't care at all, I'll go deeper

subtitles.original: 'Till I can quit, never gonna stop 'cause I don't have a limit
subtitles.english: 'Till I can quit, never gonna stop 'cause I don't have a limit

subtitles.english: My moral compass is out of focus

subtitles.original: 空覚えだもん人生ゲーム
subtitles.english: Life game is just a rough memory

subtitles.original: 言い訳みたハートに従って
subtitles.english: Following the heart that looks like an excuse

subtitles.original: 現実は半熟のフロートです
subtitles.english: Reality is a soft-boiled float

subtitles.original: 取り憑かれるオーバチュア
subtitles.english: Overture being possessed

subtitles.original: 世渡り上手なあのコはね
subtitles.english: That girl who's good at navigating the world

subtitles.original: 二度とかぶった猫剥がせない
subtitles.english: Can't peel off the mask she's wearing again

subtitles.original: 痛みを知ってしまったマジシャン
subtitles.english: The magician who has come to know pain

subtitles.original: 手の内はまだ明かせない
subtitles.english: I still can't reveal my hand
